author: Sigmund Seroka Weather Anchor
title: Quiet weather this weekend as sunshine and 70s return to Washington and Oregon | Weather | nbcrightnow.com
text: We will see more sunshine through the weekend as temps also increase into the mid 70s, just a few degrees above average. A very quiet weekend ahead in terms of weather after partly to mostly cloudy skies clear today. Next week starts with sunny skies and 70s before another trough passes through the region Tuesday night. The axis extends south and the longwave crosses the region through Wednesday morning. This will pull the upper jet stream south over the PNW leading to cooler temps in the 60s, rain on the west side of the Cascades with showers drifting across the shadow of the mountains to the east. A slight chance of some snow in the crests of the Cascades and MAYBE the tippy tops of the Blues. It would be very light so if you're climbing the mountains you'll notice some flurries but the snow line doesn't drop low enough to have a major impact at this time. Most precipitation will be rain in the mountains and the lower elevations. We will see wind speeds increase Tuesday afternoon/evening ahead of this next system's arrival Wednesday morning. Highs could even drop as cool as the low 60s and upper 50s by the end of next week making it feel more like fall by the weekend. Tri-Cities: Friday: Partly cloudy... 68/40 Saturday: Mostly sunny... 73/42 Sunday: Sunny... 72/41 Monday: Sunny... 75/47 Tuesday: Mostly sunny... 74/51 Wednesday: Partly to mostly cloudy, windy showers... 67/46 Thursday: Mostly cloudy, breezy strays... 62/43 Yakima: Friday: Partly cloudy... 66/37 Saturday: Sunny... 72/40 Sunday: Sunny... 74/39 Monday: Sunny... 75/46 Tuesday: Mostly sunny... 73/45 Wednesday: Partly to mostly cloudy, windy showers... 64/40 Thursday: Mostly cloudy, windy showers... 60/38

author: Reuters
title: Owners of bulker held by Houthis say 'encouraged' by reports of seafarers' imminent release | Business
text: Owners of bulker held by Houthis say 'encouraged' by reports of seafarers' imminent release [Reuters](/reuters-stories)| London | Updated: 29-12-2023 15:19 IST | Created: 29-12-2023 15:19 IST - Country: - United Kingdom Galaxy Maritime Ltd, the Isle of Man registered owner of bulk carrier "Galaxy Leader" hijacked by Yemen's Iran-aligned Houthis on Nov. 19, said on Friday that it was encouraged by reports from the Philippines that the release of 17 of their seafarers held by the Houthis was imminent. The bulker's crew was made up of 25 seafarers from Bulgaria, Mexico, Romania, Ukraine and the Philippines, and the company said it was committed to meeting the repatriation expenses of all of the captive seafarers. (This story has not been edited by Devdiscourse staff and is auto-generated from a syndicated feed.) - READ MORE ON: - [Philippines](/news?tag=Philippines) - [Iran](/news?tag=Iran) - [Bulgaria](/news?tag=Bulgaria) - [Galaxy Maritime Ltd](/news?tag=Galaxy+Maritime+Ltd) - [Romania](/news?tag=Romania) - [Houthis](/news?tag=Houthis) - [Yemen](/news?tag=Yemen) - [Ukraine](/news?tag=Ukraine) - [Mexico](/news?tag=Mexico) Advertisement ALSO READ [Yemen's Houthis claim responsibility for attack on Maersk cargo ship heading to Israel -spokesperson](/article/law-order/2746619-yemens-houthis-claim-responsibility-for-attack-on-maersk-cargo-ship-heading-to-israel--spokesperson) [Romania finds drone crater after Russian attack on Ukrainian infrastructure](/article/law-order/2745955-romania-finds-drone-crater-after-russian-attack-on-ukrainian-infrastructure) [Romania must see through tax reforms to offset pension hike impact -EU official](/article/health/2746007-romania-must-see-through-tax-reforms-to-offset-pension-hike-impact--eu-official) [FACTBOX-Who are Yemen's Houthis? author: Jason Burger
title: Soaking rain over the weekend could lead to dangerous travel conditions
text: While much of Oklahoma could use some rain, storms expected over the weekend could create dangerous situations quickly.Get the latest news stories of interest by clicking here.Officials with the Oklahoma City Fire Department said not to get cocky when you’re driving through water, in fact, all it takes is about a foot of water on the pavement to move a car.“Every single day, we have swiftwater teams assigned and ready to go in case there are swift water emergencies,” said Jon Chenoweth with the Oklahoma City Fire Department.Fire crews have dealt with high fire danger in the last week, but now they’re gearing up for possible flooding around the metro.“There are certain areas that are more prone to flooding, that are low-lying. I believe North Pennsylvania near Memorial is definitely an area we highlight, Station 15 knows about that,” Chenoweth said.Several inches of rain are expected this weekend and into Monday. Fire officials said they have recurring training for when water levels start to rise.>> Download the KOCO 5 App“They train every few months for swiftwater emergencies — they go through rope rescue training, and they know how to throw ropes and do all that stuff,” Chenoweth said.Officials said the biggest problems usually happen on the roadways. A few inches of rain may not sound like a lot, but in a vehicle, it can wreak havoc. Even though it is inconvenient, driving through questionable water is not worth the risk.“About 12 inches (of water) can move a car, and anywhere from 18 to 24 inches can move large SUVs,” Chenoweth said. “What we’re prone to see, is people getting too confident, and just drive through water. People think their pickup trucks can go through deep water.”Fire officials said they have the capability to bring on more staff if they need to, with the rain expected to start Saturday night.Top HeadlinesPreliminary report lists what might have caused Rush Fire at Wichita Mountains Wildlife RefugeSnow in Hawaii? Cold air and moisture deliver snow to the state’s tallest mountainEntire Geary Police Department, 2 city council members resignTIMELINE: Storms with severe weather threat likely this weekend in Oklahoma2 dead, 6 injured after shots ring out in Orlando as crowds celebrated Halloween

author: tednsi
title: #16 Vox: 'Los niños no recordarán a Cervantes pero, sí los cuentos narrados por transexuales disfrazados'
text:
Portada
mis comunidades
otras secciones
Vosotros sois bastante peor: no recordáis a Miguel Hernández pero sí los cuentos narrados por el subnormal de Pío Moa y el enano de mierda de Losantos. No conoceréis la Historia de España, pero sabéis balbucear que todo ésto es culpa del Comunismo. Banda de marranos, estáis como para criticar a alguien, los derechistas.
Y esto lo dice un tipo que de seguro no conoce de Cervantes más que el nombre del libro más famoso y que no se lo habrá leído.
Del resto de obras de Cervantes no sabrá ni que tenía .
Yo no sé si es que son subnormales o es que piensan que sus votantes son poco menos que borregos y se les puede pastorear fácil a base de decirles subnormalidades.
[#7](c7#c-7) Hombreeee, eso por descontado.
[#8](c8#c-8) mmmm... mMMMMMmmm.... Difícil eh?
[#7](c7#c-7) el libro más famoso y que no se lo habrá leído
Hombre, como casi nadie, quitando algún que otro fragmento para un comentario de texto que encima te catearon.
[#11](c11#c-11) 3 veces, entero.
Joder, yo creía que vivía en un país medio normal antes de que se popularizase esto de las RSS... Pero de dónde sale tanto retrasado!!?
Estos de Vox cada día son más pestilentes, y más imbecilidades no sé pueden decir.
¿Es aquí donde uno se puede desahogar agusto, sí?
Panda de ratas cavernarias catetas que no sabrían diferenciar el talento, la cultura y la inteligencia de su culo lleno de mierda. Gentuza que lleva despreciando todo lo que huela a romper su estatus Quo y que deje entrever su absoluta ignorancia en todo. Analfabetos culturales de traje y corbata que con su escasa dialéctica, sus odios y sus mentiras logran atrapar al ignorante, al zafio y al necio que han fabricado a base de torpedear el sistema educativo y formar castas en el privativo y exclusivo modelo, que buscan para separar aún más al pobre del rico, sabiendo que la única arma que tenemos es nuestra inteligencia, intentan que no tengamos acceso al conocimiento que nos lleva a ser libres del yugo del opresor capitalista. Borregos es lo que buscan para atarlos al trabajo y llevarlos a la guerra cuando sea necesario.
Bárbaros ignorantes que se pondrían a quemar libros y censurar ideas, matar al distinto, al diferente, odiando y destruyendo todo lo que no sea como ellos quieren que sea, aún que luego por detrás practiquen lo que tanto censuran y dicen odiar.
¿Y que problema hay si la gente recuerda las lecturas eróticas de un transexual disfrazado? Por algo será. Algo querremos malditos parásitos.
Os odio por convertir una cultura que no alcanzais a apreciar en vuestras bandera ideológica.
